title: Primary E-Mail is missing folders and has duplicate folders
content: My Thunderbird v. 115.10.1 (32-bit) Been using TB forever w/ GMail accounts Primary E-Mail is missing folders and has duplicate folders, one [Gmail] is inside the Inbox another is outside. Has [Sent] Doesn't appear to contain anything in either Junk and Trash folders. But, they do when I open GMail in my browser. My secondary E-Mail has no [Gmail] folder but does have Sent Mail, All Mail, Junk, Spam, Trash (empty), Trash and 3 that I created. This E-mail seems to function more completely. Is there a "repair install" a file to edit or something else to get me back to 100% operational? Can send folder properties if helpful. Image attached.
creator: MikeMc25526

title: Z archivovaných zpráv mizí obsah
content: Zdravím, otevřel jsem archivovanou zprávu z minulého roku a ke své hrůze zjistil, že je prázdná. Následnou kontrolou jsem zjistil, že je to asi u třetiny archivovaných zpráv-nemohu třeba vyvolat koupené letenky! Některé archivované zprávy se přitom uložily dvakrát, poprvé bez obsahu či s nesmyslným shlukem písmen, napodruhé s normálním obsahem. Vo se s tím dá dělat? Ztratil jsem jistotu uložených věcí...
creator: karel.mrak

title: Emails in wrong folder
content: I have a Gmail account and Talktalk account, both on TB, and sometimes as a reminder to myself I send an email from Talktalk to Gmail. However these emails do not appear in my Gmail inbox but instead go to All Mail, Important and Unwanted folders. How do I stop this.
creator: d.brooksgm

title: Disable automatic translation of email messages
content:
How do I disable automatic translation of Thunderbird messages by Deep-L (or any other machine translator)? This morning I received an email from a family member, written in German. Underneath the original message was an automated translation into English by Deep-L. I didn´t ask for this translation. I speak German as a second language, as well as other languages, and I enjoy using my linguistic abilities. Furthermore, I don´t like my private messages being passed to a database without my permission. If I want a translation of a message, I´ll ask for it.

This is evidently a new, annoying feature. I had an email exchange in German with someone just a few weeks ago without this intervention. I have tried searching the settings tab on Thunderbird, but have not discovered anything about Translation settings (not under Language settings, as far as I can see).

How do I disable Thunderbird sending emails for unwanted translation? Thank you for your assistance.
creator: ian_tupper

title: Thunderbird: Alcune cartelle non possono essere compattate
content:
Thunderbird: mi appare troppo spesso questo messaggio che compromette il mio utilizzo del server di posta: Alcune cartelle (ad esempio “Tutti i messaggi su lucavullo@gmail.com”) non possono essere compattate perché lo spazio sul disco è insufficiente. Eliminare alcuni file e riprovare.

Come posso risolverlo? Grazie mille
creator: lucavullo
